description:
Whether you call it “oil slick” or “rainbow”, this colour is awesome. Formed from lightweight aluminum, Supacaz’s Fly bottle cage looks great on all types of bikes, from enduro sleds to carbon racers, it even works on kids bikes.

  • Aluminum is light and strong
  • Flared opening guides your bottle in place
  • “Wings” hold your bottle securely
name: Supacaz Fly Ano Oil Slick Bottle Cage
